record.description: "Photograph of a drawing of President Judson and Mr. Ryerson in charge of the finances of the University of Chicago. This was a drawing (I hesitate to acknowledge it!) and is as I told you [was made] about forty years or less ago for some special occasion. Mr. Ryerson kept the original."
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Much of the caption is not legible, edited out what could be gleaned from the back of the image.
